titleStmt.title: Anglo-Judæus, or, The history of the Jews, whilst here in England relating their manners, carriage, and usage, from their admission by William the Conqueror, to their banishment : occasioned by a book, written to His Highness, the Lord Protector ... by Rabbi Menasses Ben Israel : to which is also subjoyned a particular answer / by W.H.
titleStmt.author: W. H.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for Thomas Heath ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
